thread.title: Savannah-Chatham police investigate damage to Broughton Street business
thread.title_full: Savannah-Chatham police investigate damage to Broughton Street business | savannahnow.com

author: Savannah Morning News
title: Savannah-Chatham police investigate damage to Broughton Street business
text:
By Savannah Morning News
Savannah-Chatham police are investigating property damage to a shoe store on East Broughton Street that occurred early Friday morning.
Police say a woman broke out all the windows of Globe Shoe Company, located on East Broughton Street near Drayton Street.
The woman was arrested but police are still investigating the incident, said Lt.Anthony Gallo.
